name: dataspace-ontology-tools
description: Auto-generation tools for DataSpace ontology artifacts

scripts.validate:dwp: python scripts/ontology_cli.py validate shacl -d examples/digital-waste-passport-sample.ttl -s shapes/digitalWastePassportShapes.ttl -e ontology/digitalWastePassport.ttl
scripts.validate:dwp:json: python scripts/ontology_cli.py validate shacl -d examples/digital-waste-passport-sample.jsonld -s shapes/digitalWastePassportShapes.ttl -e ontology/digitalWastePassport.ttl -f json-ld
scripts.validate:marpol:json: python scripts/ontology_cli.py validate shacl -d examples/digital-marpol-waste-passport-sample.jsonld -s shapes/digitalMarpolWastePassportShapes.ttl -e ontology/digitalMarpolWastePassport.ttl -f json-ld
